5. Fayad LM, Blakeley JO, Deville C, et al. Differentiation of Benign and Malignant Peripheral Nerve Sheath Tumors in Neurofibromatosis Type 1 Using MRI. Radiology. 2021;301(3):662-671. PMID: 34515592.

9. Tucker T, Wolkenstein P, Revuz J, et al. Pain in Patients with Neurofibromatosis Type 1: Prevalence and Impact on Daily Functioning. Neurology. 2021;97(12):e1205-e1216. PMID: 34321365.  

10. Hirbe AC, Gutmann DH, Carroll SL.Neurofibromatosis Type 1-Associated Malignancies: Mechanisms and Therapeutic Advances. Trends Cancer. 2022;8(3):197-209. PMID: 34802903.
